attributes.action: instruct the MOD to arm the population so that we can have a civil war.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Let's get it out in the open. Let's have a blood bath based on ethnic, religious lines. And we can line those fat cats and MPs up and give them a taste of british steel at the same time.
Then afterwards everything would be a lot, lot clearer.  No more worrying about 'Offending' people etc..
Come on, it'll be great!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
